cities.name: Yapkashnagar
cities.description: Yapkashnagar: the Enigmatic Metropolis. A bustling city filled with secrets and mysteries around every corner.

cities.name: Lihaspur
cities.description: Lihaspur: the Misty Labyrinth. Ancient temples shrouded in fog, whispers of forgotten tech.

cities.name: Narmis City
cities.description: Narmis City, the Steel Jungle. Towering skyscrapers and hidden underground networks.

cities.name: Shekharvati
cities.description: Shekharvati, the Sun-Kissed Valley. Rolling hills and forgotten mining tunnels.

cities.name: Nuravgram
cities.description: Nuravgram, the Quirky Village. Talking robots and malfunctioning AI guardians.
